programme.title: A New Life in the Sun
programme.desc: The owners of a vineyard open a pop-up restaurant, but there are some last-minute nerves, while two B&B proprietors host an unusual event in a bid to boost takings. In Spain, a wannabe fishing captain has to learn the ropes.(n)

programme.title: Sun, Sea and Selling Houses
programme.desc: Former London cabbie Bernie Kerslake and his wife Margaret have been holidaying in Spain for decades and now they want to set up home there.(n)

programme.title: Phil Spencer: Secret Agent
programme.desc: The property expert helps mother-of-four Pam in Harrogate, North Yorkshire, whose semi-detached home has been languishing on the market for a year. He also visits David's cottage in Huddersfield, West Yorkshire, with dated decor, a bare kitchen and a garden that resembles a jungle. Can Phil make these houses more attractive to buyers?.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Courtland Gray prepares to takeover as CEO of Peavey Electronics by donning a disguise to go incognito among the company's staff to learn how the frontline employees really feel.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Jane Grote Abell, the Chairwoman of Donatos Pizza and daughter of the company's founder, poses as a contestant on a reality TV show who is trying to win money to open her own restaurant. Her aim is to uncover where the company is going, what plans for the future should include and whether her father's values are still being upheld.(n)

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Three couples compete for the cash prize in and around Nottingham - young lovebirds Gabz and Pete, opinionated Sushma and Gulab, and country-dwelling partners John and Shaun.(n)

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: The cooking contest moves to South Yorkshire, where the first pair present a Michael Jackson-inspired menu, followed by evenings hosted by Sam and Rosie, and Ian and Lorraine.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay visits California, where his job is to help the owner of Lido Di Manhattan. Lisa Marie Hemmat, an ambitious business school graduate, has been running the restaurant for the past five years, but has failed to exert any control over the kitchen and the menu. The chef tries to teach her the basics of cooking and venue management, but trouble brews when her staff threaten to walk out on relaunch night.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: The chef revisits two restaurants, Giuseppi's and Sante La Brea, to find out whether the owners took his advice on how to raise standards. Plus, an update on Finn McCool's.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Home or Away
programme.desc: Property experts Jonnie Irwin and Jasmine Harman meet Hampshire couple Eric and Maria, who are looking to find a retirement home but have different ideas about where to relocate. They are split between settling in Romsey, where they will be closer to friends and family, or finding a home in Collioure, France.(n)

programme.title: The Secret Life of the Zoo
programme.desc: An elephant calf, Indali, is born at Chester Zoo, but her young half-sister Nandita doesn't welcome the new arrival. Meanwhile, Bush dog dad Franco is under pressure as his family grows, and Apple, an onager - a rare type of wild horse - faces a major operation.(n)

programme.title: Hidden Restaurants with Michel Roux Jr
programme.desc: Michel's journey brings him to the West Country and Wales, as he searches for secret eateries and food mavericks in remote and often bizarre places. On his travels he discovers hidden restaurants inside a garden shed, a staff canteen and a Victorian walled kitchen garden, before visiting a highly-celebrated crab shack. Later, Michel travels to London with his friend and chef Freddy Bird, and the pair meet a couple who want to turn an old barge into a fine-dining fish restaurant on the Isles of Scilly.(n)

programme.title: The Royal House of Windsor
programme.desc: The fifth installment of the series focuses on the life and tragic death of Diana, Princess of Wales. Her huge personality and celebrity status challenged the Windsors, culminating in the famous 1995 Panorama interview that prompted the Queen to demand Prince Charles to divorce Diana. After her tragic death, the House of Windsor was shaken, but she left an enduring legacy in the form of her two sons.(n)

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The eagle-eyed armchair critics share their opinions on what they have been watching during the week. The programme captures their instant reactions and lively discussions from the comfort of their own homes.(n)

programme.title: Mutiny
programme.desc: Nine men recreate a voyage by William Bligh in 1789, when he and his loyal crewmen crossed 4,000 miles of the Pacific ocean from Tonga to Timor after being cast adrift from HMS Bounty by mutinying officers and left for dead. SAS: Who Dares Wins chief instructor Anthony Middleton is in charge of a crew of eight made up of sailors and complete novices, attempting the journey in a replica 23ft open wooden boat, with similar equipment and the same rations of food and water that Bligh's men had.(n)

programme.title: 999: What's Your Emergency
programme.desc: The challenges faced by emergency services on the roads, revealing how new technology can detect people driving under the influence of drugs, leading to a rise in convictions. A woman is found to be over the limit while driving only a few streets away from her home. Emergency services personnel reveal the problems they have when dealing with elderly motorists who may no longer be able to drive safely, and how responding to an incident can have lasting repercussions.(n)

programme.title: How'd You Get So Rich
programme.desc: Katherine Ryan meets a man who made his fortune running gay bars, an American couple who got rich designing an app and now travel the world for free and a former Mafia boss who these days earns his money as a preacher.(n)

programme.title: Three Wives, One Husband
programme.desc: Documentary providing access to the community of Rockland Ranch in the middle of the Utah desert, where 14 Mormon families have made a home for themselves. Half the men here are polygamists, including father-of-16 Enoch Foster. He is one of the most influential men in the community and has two wives, who adore him and each other. But their family is set to expand again, with baby number 17 on the way - and Enoch is also courting a third wife, 25-year-old nanny Lydia.(n)

programme.title: Travel Man
programme.desc: Richard Ayoade is joined by comedian, actress and writer Aisling Bea to spend two days in the Hungarian capital, where they take in as many of the city's sights as possible - including a statue of Columbo star Peter Falk. They also have a crash course in the Hungarian language, sample goulash and local herbal liquor unicum, play a game of chess at thermal baths and go for a ride on the Zugliget chairlift, high in the Buda hills.(n)

programme.title: Dave's Guide to Spending Money
programme.desc: Dave Fishwick explores whether products are worth the price the public is willing to pay for them. He creates his own range of bottled water, drawn from the tap, and tries to sell it to fashionable restaurants. He also sets up his own renewable power station in his back garden with the goal of generating enough electricity to run Burnley's Christmas lights for free.(n)

programme.title: Sun, Sea and Selling Houses
programme.desc: Southport estate agent Gill and her friend Sue look round properties in Alicante, while in Almeria, Chris and Carol are also looking to make a permanent move to the sun.(n)

programme.title: A New Life in the Sun
programme.desc: As the season draws to a close, a couple hoping to run a fishing charter business face a big decision. Two bed-and-breakfast owners have to cope with some tricky customers, while the first guests book into an observatory business in rural France - but how will the owners go about pleasing the punters?.(n)

programme.title: Sun, Sea and Selling Houses
programme.desc: In southern Spain, follower of eastern philosophy Elizabeth Moore tasks estate agent duo Sharon and Steve Garner to find her an apartment near the beach for 78,000 euros.(n)

programme.title: Phil Spencer: Secret Agent
programme.desc: In Ashurst Wood, West Sussex, the property expert helps to modernise a cluttered 1950s home so retired couple Tim and Gina can take the unusual step of upsizing. In Weybridge, Surrey, he visits a not-so-Swinging Sixties pad inherited by siblings Nigel and Beverley, who need to bring their property up to scratch before potential buyers arrive.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Todd Pedersen, CEO and founder of Vivint, a leading solar and home security business, based in Utah, goes undercover among his own workforce posing as a contestant on a reality show. He's proud to head an organisation that provides a fun and relaxed work environment, but now that the company is offering smart home technology, it's in competition with much larger organisations, and Todd wants to make sure it's fully prepared to take them on.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Anthony Wedo, President and CEO of Buffets, Inc, goes undercover to find out what his staff members are really like. He was brought on to the team to turn the firm around after years of challenges and poses as a construction worker to find out the flaws in the business.(n)

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Young Brighton couple Hannah and Luke kick-off the competition with an ambitiously trendy menu, while more experienced hosts Karen and Mark step up to the plate the next day.(n)

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Three couples compete in East Sussex. The food includes burgers followed by jelly, and a traditional Ghanaian menu, leaving the third pair confident they have it in the bag.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay heads to Boca Raton in Florida to turn around the fortunes of Italian restaurant Anna Vincenzo's. The owner opened the establishment in 2001 with the help of her father but the business has failed to meet her expectations, and the chef realises that her ruthless style of management is having an adverse influence, not only on her staff but also on her family.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: The chef heads to family-owned Italian restaurant Giuseppi's in Macomb Township, Michigan. Father and son Joe and Sam Borgia's constant fighting is driving customers away, and Gordon discovers one of the restaurateurs is concealing a serious health problem. Nevertheless, he sets about rescuing them from disaster and turning around the failing business.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Home or Away
programme.desc: Luke Doonan and Jasmine Harman help a couple who are torn between returning to family roots in Northumberland or heading to the warmer climate of southern France. They need to find a place big enough to cater for their large family and are searching for somewhere with plenty of land.(n)

programme.title: Great British Buildings: Restoration of the Year
programme.desc: Kevin McCloud and Anna Keay visit some of the UK's most successful restorations of historic buildings, all of which have been placed on the Royal Institution of Chartered Surveyors' long list for their Restoration of the Year award. At the end of the programme, Kevin and Anna are joined by historic building surveyor Marianne Suhr and architectural historian Jonathan Foyle to decide which buildings should make the final shortlist. First up are a watermill brought back to life in Cambridgeshire, a seaside villa in Lyme Regis, a Georgian innovation in Northumberland, and a rescued castle in Ceredigion.(n)

programme.title: The Royal House of Windsor
programme.desc: The fifth installment of the series focuses on the life and tragic death of Diana, Princess of Wales. Her huge personality and celebrity status challenged the Windsors, culminating in the famous 1995 Panorama interview that prompted the Queen to demand Prince Charles to divorce Diana. After her tragic death, the House of Windsor was shaken, but she left an enduring legacy in the form of her two sons.(n)

programme.title: A Very British Hotel
programme.desc: The hotel throws a party to celebrate the book launch of Mount, the latest novel by Jilly Cooper, but a gatecrasher has to be escorted off the premises. Meanwhile, some of the old fixtures and fittings are sold at auction to help raise money for refurbishing the rooms, and at Dinner by Heston Blumenthal - the two Michelin-starred restaurant in the hotel - executive chef Ashley Palmer-Watts and his team create a new dish and have to wait to hear whether they have retained their prestigious Michelin stars.(n)

programme.title: A Very British Brothel
programme.desc: Documentary charting the day-to-day workings of a Sheffield massage parlour run by a mother and daughter, revealing the struggle to fill the daily rota and how management deal with problem clients. The programme also explores the lives of the women who advertise their services and for whom sex is just a job.(n)

programme.title: 8 Simple Rules
programme.desc: Cate suspects she may be pregnant, but is dismayed by her family's selfish reactions. Kerry's relationship with Kyle makes her extremely popular at school, while Bridget finds herself left out in the cold.(n)

programme.title: 8 Simple Rules
programme.desc: Paul challenges everyone in the family to give up their bad habits for one week, and whoever wins gets to choose their holiday destination. However, the contest is threatened by a variety of vices. Starring John Ritter and Katey Sagal.(n)

programme.title: Gilmore Girls
programme.desc: Richard's mother, who is also called Lorelai, arrives from London and offers a trust fund for Rory's education, leaving Emily afraid she will lose contact with her daughter and grand-daughter once they are financially secure. Drama, starring Lauren Graham and Alexis Bledel.(n)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Michael has an anti-wrinkle injection, but it has the unfortunate side-effect of leaving his mouth twisted into a permanent smile - which soon gets him into trouble. American sitcom, starring Damon Wayans.(n)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Michael takes extreme measures to ensure he does not catch the flu from his ailing family - including spraying them with disinfectant and using a 10ft extending grabber to hand Jay her orange juice. Comedy, starring Damon Wayans.(n)

programme.title: Can't Pay? We'll Take It Away
programme.desc: The debt collection agents grapple with emotional evictions and moral dilemmas during the festive period, including a young family in Crystal Palace who are made homeless when the landlord repossesses their home because he wants to redevelop the property. The eviction comes as a shock to the family as they are up-to-date with their rent, but have just one hour to gather their belongings. Plus, an acrimonious divorce in Chessington comes to a head when the estranged wife obtains a writ to reclaim the house, and an off-licence owner in Hampshire with unpaid rent of more than £5,000 battles to keep his business open just as everything shuts down for the holidays.(n)

programme.title: Can't Pay? We'll Take It Away
programme.desc: Agents Stewart and Iain head to Lancashire for an eviction that proves to be the most confrontational case they have ever faced. In Surrey, Brian and Del chase over £2,000 owed by a single mother for an unpaid childcare bill, before trying to recover £12,000 of debt on credit cards. Meanwhile, Stewart and Iain's patience is tested to the limit during another eviction in Birmingham.(n)

programme.title: The Island
programme.desc: The naive survivors of an apparent ecological disaster work, rest and play inside their utopian sealed community in the year 2019, each hoping to win a ticket to an idyllic island in a regular lottery draw. However, a curious inhabitant discovers the restricted society is a facade shielding a sinister cloning operation and is determined to escape. Sci-fi thriller, starring Ewan McGregor, Scarlett Johansson, Sean Bean and Steve Buscemi.(n)

programme.title: The Island
programme.desc: The naive survivors of an apparent ecological disaster work, rest and play inside their utopian sealed community in the year 2019, each hoping to win a ticket to an idyllic island in a regular lottery draw. Sci-fi thriller, starring Ewan McGregor, Scarlett Johansson, Sean Bean and Steve Buscemi.(n)

programme.title: I Love You, Man
programme.desc: Friendless Peter Klaven goes on a series of man-dates to find a Best Man for his wedding. But when his insta-bond with his new B.F.F. puts a strain on his relationship with his fiancée, can the trio learn to live happily ever after?(n)

programme.title: Life Is Beautiful
programme.desc: In this WW II tragicomedy, famed Italian funnyman Roberto Benigni (The Monster) portrays Guido, who moves during the '30s from the country to a Tuscan town, where he is entranced by schoolteacher Dora (Nicoletta Braschi, Benigni's real-life wife). Dora likes Guido, but she remains faithful to her pompous fiancé, so Guido has an uphill struggle. Meanwhile, anti-Semitic attitudes lead to attacks against Guido's Jewish uncle (Giustino Durano). Leaping ahead to five years later, during WW II, Guido and Dora are married and have a son Giosue (Giorgio Cantarini). After they are imprisoned in a concentration camp, Guido goes to elaborate lengths to keep his son from understanding the truth of their situation. He tells the boy that they are competing with others to win an armored tank -- so everything from food shortages to tattoos is explained as necessary for participation in the contest(n)

programme.title: Run Fatboy Run
programme.desc: Five years after jilting his pregnant fiancée on their wedding day, out-of-shape Dennis decides to run a marathon to win her back(n)

programme.title: Inventing the Abbotts
programme.desc: A light-hearted story of two brothers courting three sisters(n)

programme.title: Ghost
programme.desc: Patrick Swayze, Demi Moore and Whoopi Goldberg star in this romantic fantasy about a recently deceased man who attempts to contact his girlfriend through a fraudulent medium. Realising that his murder was a way of silencing him, Sam is anxious to protect his girlfriend. But will she believe medium Oda Mae's claims that she is in contact with him - and can the pair of them foil the money-laundering plot which Sam discovered?(n)

programme.title: Say Anything...
programme.desc: A beautiful and brilliant high school student finds herself pursued romantically by a charming but totally unambitious fellow student(n)

programme.title: Mr. Deeds
programme.desc: Adam Sandler stars in a heartwarming update of the 1936 Frank Capra classic "Mr. Deeds Goes to Town." Sandler plays Gary Cooper's role, a kindhearted New Hampshire rube who inherits a fortune, then outsmarts some greedy city slickers in Manhattan. Winona Ryder, Peter Gallagher, John Turturro, Jared Harris(n)

programme.title: Tremors
programme.desc: Tongue-in-cheek horror tale in which a small Nevada desert town is terrorised by giant man-eating worms. Two handymen are forced to postpone their plans to escape their humdrum lives after several mysterious deaths and a series of earthquakes turn out to be the work of predatory subterranean creatures which lay siege to the terrified townsfolk. An affectionate homage to the 'creature features' of the 1950s(n)

programme.title: Hostage
programme.desc: A former hostage negotiator-turned-small-town cop finds himself unable to escape his past when a gang attempts to burgle the home of a local wealthy accountant, holding him and his two children captive(n)

programme.title: Executive Decision
programme.desc: A special ops team are sent onto a hijacked jumbo jet filled with deadly nerve gas(n)

programme.title: Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen
programme.desc: Two years after saving the world with the Autobots, Sam Witwicky is heading off to university when an ancient Decepticon named The Fallen returns to Earth seeking revenge. Their home planet of Cybertron rendered uninhabitable, the Autobots begin working with the military to hunt down any remaining Decepticons. Meanwhile, Sam and Mikaela race to unlock the secret history of the Transformers on Earth in order to save the planet from the most-formidable Decepticon to date(n)

programme.title: Platoon
programme.desc: This intense drama examines the fight between good and evil among an American infantry platoon in the jungles of Vietnam. Writer/director Stone draws on his own first-hand experiences of combat and takes a close look at the life of foot soldiers, as seen through the eyes of a new recruit(n)

programme.title: Ocean's Thirteen
programme.desc: When their old pal Reuben has a heart attack after being double-crossed by scheming businessman Willie Bank, Danny Ocean's team of gifted grifters reunite to get their own back. Thriller(n)

programme.title: Hardball
programme.desc: Television actor-turned-director Brian Robbins follows up Varsity Blues (1999) and Ready to Rumble (2000) with another sports comedy. Keanu Reeves stars as Conor O'Neill, an underachiever and inveterate sports gambler who needs a bailout loan from a friend to pay off his mounting debt. As a condition for receiving the necessary funds, Conor is saddled with coaching a corporate-sponsored Little League baseball team for underprivileged youth in Chicago's notorious Cabrini Green housing project. Reluctant at first, Conor slowly begins to enjoy his new authority role, especially when he makes the acquaintance of his players' attractive teacher, Elizabeth Wilkes (Diane Lane). Based on the real-life chronicle Hardball: A Season in the Projects by Outside magazine editor Daniel Coyle, Hardball also stars D.B. Sweeney and Mike McGlone(n)

programme.title: Babylon A.D.
programme.desc: Hong Kong action icon Michelle Yeoh stars alongside American muscle Vin Diesel in this science fiction thriller concerning a nun who is charged with the task of caring for a young girl who may be the carrier of a deadly virus. Based on author Maurice Dantec's Babylon Babies, this tale of genetic manipulation comes to the screen courtesy of director Mathieu Kassovitz(n)

programme.title: Jennifer Eight
programme.desc: Ex-LA cop John Berlin moves to a small town and begins investigating a series of murders leading him to a blind woman who seems to be the key to the serial killer's next move(n)

programme.title: Scream 2
programme.desc: Wes Craven directs this funny and frightening sequel to the movie which breathed new life into the horror genre. When the gory events of the first film are made into a movie, Stab, the survivors find themselves terrorized anew by a knife-wielding man in a terrifyingly familiar Hallowe'en mask. With the characters as aware of the conventions of sequels as the audience, the movie pokes fun at itself, yet still manages to raise a scream or two(n)

programme.title: The Sweetest Thing
programme.desc: A lovelorn woman has all but given up trying to find Mr Right when she meets a mysterious and attractive estate agent at a nightclub. However, the man disappears before the woman can get to know him. With the help of her friends, she sets out on an eventful road trip to track down her would-be lover at his brother's wedding(n)

programme.title: Mistress America
programme.desc: A mousy college freshman living on her own in New York City meets Brooke, her stepsister-to-be, and is soon entranced by her worldliness and flummoxed by her impulsive nature(n)

programme.title: Me and Earl and the Dying Girl
programme.desc: In this quirky meditation on art, death and high school, a misfit teen befriends a female classmate who has leukemia. As they grow closer, she helps him with his creative endeavors and forces him to confront the messiness of real life(n)

programme.title: Monster's Ball
programme.desc: An Oscar-winning Halle Berry stars as the Death Row widow who shares her grief and her bed with prison guard Billy Bob Thornton. Powerful drama with Heath Ledger(n)

programme.title: Pearl Harbor
programme.desc: Ben Affleck and Josh Hartnett star in a WWII blockbuster from the director of Transformers. A US pilot travels to Britain to fight in the war just before the Japanese attack(n)

programme.title: Scarface
programme.desc: Tony Montana, an exiled Cuban criminal goes to work for Miami drug lord Robert Loggia. Montana rises to the top of Florida's crime chain, appropriating Loggia's cocaine-addicted mistress in the process(n)

programme.title: Mission: Impossible II
programme.desc: Special agent Ethan Hunt is plunged into an international crisis. With computer genius Ving Rhames at his side and beautiful thief Thandie Newton on his mind, Hunt races across Australia and Spain on an impossible mission(n)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance to buy goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: Longmire
programme.desc: The sheriff's department investigates a highway incident in which one man has died and the other left injured. Curiously, both men where known to be enemies, and the dead man's father seems less concerned with his son's fate than he is with the survivor's wellbeing. Meanwhile, Henry tries to bring the rapists to justice, Cady approaches Mathias about doing legal work for the reservation, and Walt hesitates about asking Dr Donna Sue Monahan for a date.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A politician is embroiled in a triple murder, but persuading him to reveal the truth is only the first step toward unmasking a killer willing to go to any lengths to avoid capture. Crime drama, starring Sam Waterston and Jesse L Martin.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: An investigation into a hit-and-run leads to a property scam, but Green, Rubirosa and Lupo's undercover work takes a surprising twist that pits McCoy against the US Attorney's office. January Jones (Mad Men) guest stars.(n)

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: DB Russell heads to New York to help Mac search for his kidnapped girlfriend Christine, and James Boyd arranges to meet up with the gang to drop off the diamonds and release the hostages. With the CSI team monitoring his every movement, Boyd starts to ask too many questions and the captors begin to suspect he has involved the police. Conclusion of the two-part crossover between the Las Vegas and New York CSI franchises, starring Gary Sinise and Ted Danson.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Kidnappers strike on Halloween, wounding a marine sergeant and snatching his daughter - leaving the team members wondering why anyone would try to extort money from someone on such a modest salary. As the agents begin searching for a motive, Abby surprises everyone by turning up at the lab in a revealing fancy-dress costume.(n)

programme.title: Cedar Cove
programme.desc: Olivia comforts her best friend Grace when she is issued with divorce papers, and Justine makes a big decision when Warren reveals his plan to demolish the lighthouse and develop the land. Meanwhile, the owners of a local bed and breakfast decide to protest against the destruction and the case makes its way to Olivia's courtroom. Drama following the fortunes of a small-town judge, starring Andie MacDowell.(n)

programme.title: The Mysteries of Laura
programme.desc: Comedy drama starring Debra Messing as New York homicide detective Laura Diamond, as she navigates juggling a difficult work and home life. In the opening episode, the police officer is called to help with a hostage situation, and discovers her twin boys have been expelled from their nursery.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A legal-aid strike leads first to murder, and then to Rubirosa pitting her wits against Cutter as the ADA tries to bring a case against a pro golfer accused of the killing of a paralegal. American legal drama, starring Alana De La Garza and Linus Roache.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Lupo and Bernard investigate the world of online romance when a garage mechanic is murdered, but the case takes a series of bizarre turns before they are able to identify the killer. Police drama, starring Anthony Anderson and Jeremy Sisto.(n)

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: Danny and Lindsay investigate the murder of a woman at a promotional event for vodka and discover she was stabbed with an icicle, forcing the team to gather all the evidence before the clues melt. Mac and Stella examine the case of a runner found lying in a pool of his own blood during a marathon. Forensic drama, starring Gary Sinise and Carmine Giovinazzo.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A marine major is found dead in an underground maintenance room, having scratched out one of his own eyes - and the presence of a webcam suggests someone watched him die. The team investigates with the help of Lt Col Hollis Mann, and links the case to wanted terrorist Mamoun Sharif, an old adversary who is threatening to unleash a chemical attack.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The agents try to track down an arms dealer who has the launch codes for the Navy's encrypted satellite defence system and is offering them to the highest bidder. In an attempt to win the confidence of the buyer, Ducky poses as an ageing Englishman trying to sell the information. Guest starring Armand Assante, with David McCallum and Mark Harmon.(n)

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Otis tries to pluck up the courage to ask Kelly for permission to date his sister, while Boden finds romance in the most unlikely of places. Troubling times await Casey as the extent of his memory loss becomes apparent, Shay discovers she has been left a large sum of money and Dawson catches fellow recruit Rebecca cheating on a test.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Warner attend the scene after assistant district attorney Page Ferguson falls to her death from the top of a multi-storey car park. Warner examines the body and initially concludes that the victim had been raped and cut with a knife, while Benson learns that she was leading a unit that prosecuted a gang of drug dealers - the head of which recently started a prison sentence due to her work.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A team investigates a young French model's claim that, after being brought to New York on a billionaire's private jet, she was raped by him at his 50th birthday party. The girl reveals there was another youngster on the plane, so Benson and Stabler try to trace the whereabouts of the potential witness.(n)

programme.title: Criminal Minds: Suspect Behavior
programme.desc: Three people are killed by what the authorities believe to be a serial-killing sniper. Mick soon finds himself being taunted by the murderer, after he and the team are tasked with making an arrest. Matt Ryan stars.(n)

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
programme.desc: A woman falls to her death from a balcony, and Nick later learns she was due to be married but had recently lost her job at a bank over accusations she stole $10,000. Grissom hunts the killer of a school guidance counsellor, and former CSI Sara appeals for leniency in the case of a man accused of murdering his comatose wife. Guest starring Bruce Weitz (Hill Street Blues).(n)

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
programme.desc: Artfully positioned corpses are discovered around the city, leading Catherine and Grissom to suspect an unhinged and embittered artist has turned to murder. Meanwhile, a new recruit arrives at HQ, and a grief counsellor tries to help members of the team come to terms with Warrick's death - but not everyone welcomes her advice. With guest star Alex Kingston.(n)

programme.title: Chicago PD
programme.desc: Notoriously dirty cop Hank Voight and his colleagues in the District 21 Intelligence Unit go on a quest to intercept a special consignment of ammunition before it hits the streets. Meanwhile, routine surveillance of a suspect's apartment leads to a first traumatic on-duty shooting for Ruzek, as well as a shocking discovery. Crime drama, starring Jason Beghe and Sophia Bush.(n)

programme.desc: A chance for viewers to purchase goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance to buy goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: Access
programme.desc: Showbiz news and gossip.(n)

programme.title: Longmire
programme.desc: One of the oil rig workers accused of raping Gabriella is murdered. A long list of suspects soon emerges, from Gabriella's mother seeking revenge to the dead man's supervisor trying to cover up dangerous information. However, Cady becomes convinced that Henry is the killer. One of the rejected candidates for the deputy post takes to spying on Walt and the Ferg.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A riot at an immigration rally in Central Park ends in murder, and the political climate forces McCoy to assign a special prosecutor, who starts to increase tensions in the office with his anti-establishment attitude. Police drama, starring Sam Waterston and Jesse L Martin.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A case of mistaken identity leads Green and Lupo to suspect an innocent doctor has been murdered in place of a killer's true target, a physician who administered a botched lethal injection in South Carolina. Police drama, starring Jesse L Martin and Jeremy Sisto.(n)

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: The CSIs are alerted to three separate murders on Valentine's Day, as a diabetic man dies from eating 2lbs of chocolate, the CEO of a company is killed at an outdoor farmers' market while on the way to meet his soon-to-be ex-wife, and a man is found dead in a hotel room. Crime drama, starring Gary Sinise and Eddie Cahill.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team joins forces with military investigators to ascertain whether terrorists were responsible for an explosion at a golf course in which a marine colonel was killed. As inquiries proceed, McGee has to use his computer skills to break into secret government files to ensure the murderers are apprehended. Crime drama, starring Mark Harmon.(n)

programme.title: Cedar Cove
programme.desc: Jack's estranged son Eric turns up after being kicked out by his girlfriend in Vancouver. Charlotte is given a mysterious key by the elderly man she cares for, and tries to work out which lock it opens. Meanwhile, Maryellen becomes jealous when her mother praises Olivia's daughter. Drama following the fortunes of Olivia Lockhart, a small-town judge, both inside and away from the courtroom.(n)

programme.title: The Mysteries of Laura
programme.sub-title: The Mystery of the Dead Date.
programme.desc: Billy and Laura are called to a hotel to investigate the murder of a woman who checked in using a pseudonym, and was later found strangled in one of the rooms. Following a chain of evidence, Laura discovers the victim is Crista, a lonely 40-year-old divorcee, had been using an online dating agency, and turns her attention to the woman's past dates as she searches for the culprit. However, the only way to find out whether one of Crista's suitors is a killer is for Laura to sign up to the same service herself, and under Billy's watchful eye, she prepares for what could turn out to be a deadly date. Comedy crime drama, starring Debra Messing.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A jeweller's murder is linked to a prostitution business, and the subsequent trial puts McCoy's job on the line as interested parties try to call in old favours. Award-winning police drama, starring Sam Waterston.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Curtis investigate the abduction and murder of a teacher, and later discover it's possible that she knew the culprit. Having arrested one of her students, the courts quickly decide their evidence is inadmissible - but it seems another assailant could be to blame. Benjamin Bratt and Jerry Orbach star.(n)

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: Mac and the team investigate the death of a hotel employee who plummeted from a balcony, and are alerted to another case by the sound of gunfire. Rushing to the scene, they find a woman who has shot dead a man for attacking her husband - an incident that brings back painful memories for Stella, who once killed a boyfriend in self-defence.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A sailor's body is discovered in a disused restaurant, and his death is initially ascribed to an accidental drug overdose. However, Abby discovers a message written in blood on a laminated card found at the scene and realises he was murdered. Meanwhile, Jimmy continues to pursue a relationship with Agent Michelle Lee.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A nuclear power plant inspector suffers radiation poisoning, forcing the team to consider the possibility that a foreign power deliberately targeted him. programme.title: Nanny McPhee
programme.desc: A nanny reveals ways of making children behave that are much more effective than a time-out in this fantasy comedy based on the "Nurse Matilda" books for children by Christianna Brand. Near the dawn of the twentieth century, Mr. Brown (Colin Firth) is a widower who must tend to his business as an undertaker while looking after his brood of seven children. Brown's offspring are a singularly ill-mannered lot who have managed to drive away 17 different nannies when their father arranges for one Nanny McPhee (Emma Thompson) to help out with the children. McPhee is an strange looking woman with a large nose, protruding teeth, and pock-marked skin, but it isn't long before the kids realize she has magical powers and isn't afraid to use them to help keep them in line. While the children aren't taken with McPhee's insistence on such things as saying "please" and listening to their elders, it becomes clear everyone has bigger things to worry about. Aunt Adelaide (Angela Lansbury) has insisted that if Mr. Brown cannot find a new wife within a month, she'll take custody of one of the children and cut off Brown's inheritance, and while Brown and the widow Mrs. Quickly (Celia Imrie) seem fond of one another, his ineptitude in courtship seems to insure he'll never get her to the altar. But while the Brown Children realize Nanny McPhee is a formidable opponent, she can also be a valuable ally as they learn to make use of her talents by being better children; they also discover that as they behave better, she begins to look less frightening. Emma Thompson, who played the title role in Nanny McPhee, also wrote the film's screenplay(n)

programme.title: Nanny McPhee Returns

programme.title: The Departed
programme.desc: After being nominated seven times to the Oscars, Martin Scorsese won the Best Director statuette for this crime thriller starring Leonardo DiCaprio, Matt Damon, Jack Nicholson and Mark Wahlberg, among other stars. Billy Costigan is a police officer assigned to work undercover with Irish mobster Frank Costello to get evidences to arrest him. On the other side, Colin Sullivan, the informer of Costello, is promoted in the Massachusetts State Police. The Departed also received the Best Picture Academy Award(n)

programme.title: The Shawshank Redemption
programme.desc: Based on a story by Stephen King, The Shawshank Redemption is the directorial debut of screenwriter Frank Darabont. In 1946, a banker named Andy Dufresne is convicted of a double murder, even though he stubbornly proclaims his innocence. He's sentenced to a life term at the Shawshank State Prison in Maine, where another lifer, Ellis "Red" Redding, picks him as the new recruit most likely to crack under the pressure. The ugly realities of prison life are quickly introduced to Andy: a corrupt warden,sadistic guards led by Capt. Byron Hadley, and inmates who are little better than animals, willing to use rape or beatings to insure their dominance. But Andy does not crack: he has the hope of the truly innocent, which allow him to prevail behind bars. He uses his banking skills to win favor with the warden and the guards, doing the books for Norton's illegal business schemes and keeping an eye on the investments of most of the prison staff. In exchange, he is able to improve the prison library and bring some dignity and respect back to many of the inmates, including Red. Starring Morgan Freeman, Tim Robbins, Bob Gunton(n)

programme.desc: Five years after jilting his pregnant fiancée on their wedding day, out-of-shape Dennis decides to run a marathon to win her back(n)

programme.title: Captain Ron
programme.desc: After he inherits a yacht, Chicago businessman Martin totes his family to the Caribbean to claim it. Not having any skill at boating, he hires long-haired, one-eyed low-life Captain Ron, to pilot the heap to Miami. During the journey, the somewhat inept sailor frequently loses his way while becoming a hit with everyone in the family--except Martin(n)

programme.title: Mimic
programme.desc: A disease carried by common cockroaches is killing Manhattan children. In an effort to stop the epidemic an entomologist, Susan Tyler, creates a mutant breed of insect that secretes a fluid to kill the roaches. This mutant breed was engineered to die after one generation, but three years later Susan finds out that the species has survived and evolved into a large, gruesome monster that can mimic human form(n)

programme.title: Lights Out

programme.title: Dark Water
programme.desc: Ghost story about a divorced woman and her daughter who move into a creepy apartment building off New York City's East River. The haunting conditions force the residents to examine the history of the building's former tenants(n)

programme.title: Tremors 4: The Legend Begins
programme.desc: Something is attacking the mine workers in the remote town of Rejection, Nevada. The mine owner, Hiram Gummer, is forced to hire a man to remove the creature..(n)

programme.title: Fantastic Four
programme.desc: A brilliant scientist builds a device that allows users to teleport to an alternate dimension, but an experiment involving it goes wrong and leaves him and his three teammates with unusual superpowers. The quartet are then forced to work together to battle an enemy from their past(n)

programme.title: Necessary Roughness
programme.desc: A Texas university football team, desperate for a win, takes to unorthodox recruiting and gets in trouble for it. As a result the coach is forced to look to actual students for potential players. Fortunately, he finds salvation in the form of a thirtysomething man with a phenomenal throwing arm(n)

programme.title: Leatherheads
programme.desc: Good Night, and Good Luck director George Clooney pulls double duty once again in this sports-oriented romantic comedy set against the formation of professional football in the 1920s. Dodge Connelly (Clooney) is a brash and handsome gridiron giant who is equally comfortable leading his team in a barroom brawl or charging for a touchdown in a packed stadium. But when Connelly's team loses their sponsor and the entire league appears set to collapse, the quick-thinking jock attempts a creative late-game comeback. If Connelly can convince former college football star and decorated war hero Carter Rutherford (John Krasinski) to join the team, there may be hope for the ill-fated team after all. Back in World War I, Rutherford single-handedly forced the surrender of multiple German soldiers -- a feat that firmly established the dashing young soldier as America's favorite son. Not only that, but Rutherford's unparalleled speed makes him a valuable asset to the team. To cub reporter Lexie Littleton (Renée Zellweger), Rutherford seems simply too good to be true, and she's determined to prove that her theory is correct. As Littleton digs deep into Rutherford's past, the two teammates enter into a fierce competition for her erratic affections. Now, as Connelly's plan begins to work better than he ever could have anticipated, the rowdy sport he always loved starts to take on a whole new look and feel. In the midst of holding his team together and simultaneously charming the girl of his dreams, Connelly discovers he may be able to use the same strategies he does to win on the field to win in love. Of course, there might be a few fouls as this game enters the fourth quarter, but like every good player, Connelly knows the value of always having a secret play to fall back on before the final score is called(n)

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber

programme.title: Cheech and Chong's Next Movie
programme.desc: In an unfunny, scattered sequel to their successful Up in Smoke, Cheech Marin and Tommy Chong reprise their roles as carefree men who do inhale. But this time around Cheech is out of a job and trying to dodge his bilious neighbor while chasing the lovely Donna (Evelyn Guerrero) with anything but honorable intentions. Meanwhile, Cheech's cousin Red (also Cheech Marin) and Chong go tooling around Hollywood in a luxury sports car looking for adventure(n)

programme.title: Shoot 'Em Up
programme.desc: A mysterious loner assumes the responsibility of protecting a newborn from a group of men determined to kill the child in first-time director/screenwriter Michael Davis' nonstop, adrenaline-fueled action film. Mr. Smith (Clive Owen) is the last man that a parent would want to have looking after their child, yet after stumbling upon a blazing shoot-out, helping to birth a child amidst a hail of gunfire, and seeing the mother die before his eyes, he becomes determined to protect the young innocent at all costs. But his adversaries are equally determined, and they will not stop until the newborn is dead. Now, in order to ensure that maniacal criminal mastermind Mr. Hertz (Paul Giamatti) and his gang of henchmen do not succeed in accomplishing their nefarious goal, Mr. Smith joins forces with a prostitute known as the Dairy Queen (Monica Bellucci), who specializes in lactation fetishes, and flees into the bowels of the city while facing almost certain death on every street corner(n)

programme.title: Off-Air
programme.desc: Off-Air(n)

Reilly, Willem Dafoe, Salma Hayek(n)

Paul Racine is also wounded in the scuffle. Now he finds himself a target for the ninja cult. He finds help from a samurai who secretly plans to use Racine as a pawn in a plot to end an ancient feud. The Samurai's wife is also involved. The ninja's will stop at nothing to get Racine. They will even blow up a bus load of innocent people. But no matter what the ninja's plot, they can't seem to kill Racine. The final confrontation is held during a tremendous rainstorm(n)

programme.title: Mr. Woodcock
programme.desc: John Farley (Sean William Scott) has overcome years of childhood and teenage humiliation and has fashioned himself into a self-help author who guides others towards releasing their painful memories and rebuilding their self-esteem. However, his miserable past sneaks up on him when he returns to his hometown only to find that his mother is marrying Mr. Woodcock (Billy Bob Thornton), the tough gym teacher who was the source of his school years' woes. Determined to stop his mother from marrying the man who made school a living hell for him, John is going to need all the self-help he can get.
