programme.desc: A state trooper with multiple personality disorder tries to save a woman from thugs(n)

programme.title: The Meddler
programme.desc: After the death of her husband, a woman named Marnie relocates to L.A. to be closer to her daughter Lori, a Hollywood screenwriter. While Lori frets about her mum's smothering ways, Marnie keeps getting involved in the lives of others(n)

programme.title: For Love of the Game
programme.desc: A veteran pitcher played by , reflects on his life and career as he pitches his final game(n)

programme.title: Friday After Next
programme.desc: The gang from Friday and Next Friday are back in this urban comedy, in which Craig (Ice Cube) and Day-Day (Mike Epps) have finally moved out of their respective parents' homes and gotten an apartment together. However, a bogus neighborhood Santa Claus (Rickey Smiley) decides to help Craig and Day-Day share the wealth by robbing their apartment, and when he rips off their stereo, he also makes off with their rent money, which was hidden in the speaker cabinets. Desperate to make rent and have some money for Christmas presents, Craig and Day-Day land jobs at a local strip mall, where their fathers, Mr. Jones (John Witherspoon) and Uncle Elroy (Don "D.C." Curry), have gone into business together running a barbecue joint. Craig and Day-Day are installed as security guards, and while Craig tries to make time with Donna (K.D. Aubert), a saleswoman at the Pimp N' Ho's Boutique, and keep things orderly at Holy Moly's Doughnut Shop, Day-Day attempts to transform himself into a master of crime-fighting, which causes a lot more problems than it solves. Friday After Next is the first feature film from director Marcus Raboy, who previously directed music videos for Sting, Li'l Kim, Staind, and Friday After Next star Ice Cube(n)

programme.title: Reservoir Dogs
programme.desc: The grim, violent tale of a heist gone wrong. Six criminals - all with pseudonyms, and strangers to one another - are hired for a diamond robbery, but they are ambushed by police and forced to shoot their way out. At their warehouse rendezvous, the survivors, realising they were set up, try to find the traitor in their midst as this controversial exploration of betrayal moves inexorably to its blood-soaked climax(n)

programme.title: Me, Myself & Irene
programme.desc: A state trooper with multiple personality disorder tries to save a woman from thugs(n)

programme.title: Blow
programme.desc: In this intense, fact-based biopic, Johnny Depp plays American entrepreneur George Jung, who was the nation's top supplier of cocaine from the late '70s to the early '80s. Jung went from dealing pot to hooking up with the big-time Colombian drug cartels to deal their powder. Penelope Cruz, Ethan Suplee, Rachel Griffiths, Ray Liotta(n)

programme.title: National Treasure: Book of Secrets
programme.desc: In this adventure-filled sequel to the 2004 blockbuster 'National Treasure', Nicolas Cage reprises his role as artifact hunter and archaeologist Benjamin Franklin Gates. During a lecture about John Wilkes Booth (Abraham Lincoln¿s murderer) and Thomas Gates (Ben¿s great-grandfather), another treasure hunter by the name of Mitch Wilkinson stands up and presents a missing page of Booth¿s diary -- where Thomas is mentioned as a co-conspirator in Lincoln¿s assassination. Outraged, Ben decides to prove the honor of his ancestor, and together with his wife, Abigail, and his best friend, the writer Riley Poole, heads to France, England and Washington to collect clues(n)

Gemma is surprised by a phone call from Julien and finds a new purpose that helps break through her stupor(n)

programme.title: Planet Terror
programme.desc: Director R. Rodriguez pays homage to his favourite B-movies with PLANET TERROR, an old-fashioned zombie film that's infused with enough gore and giggles to please even Peter Jackson. Rose McGowan plays Cherry, a go-go dancer whose night is interrupted by a vicious zombie attack that leaves her missing a leg. Her ex-boyfriend takes charge, fashioning her a new leg from a machine gun and killing zombies along the way(n)

programme.title: Reservoir Dogs
programme.desc: The grim, violent tale of a heist gone wrong. Six criminals - all with pseudonyms, and strangers to one another - are hired for a diamond robbery, but they are ambushed by police and forced to shoot their way out. At their warehouse rendezvous, the survivors, realising they were set up, try to find the traitor in their midst as this controversial exploration of betrayal moves inexorably to its blood-soaked climax(n)

programme.title: Grindhouse
programme.desc: In a throwback to 1970s exploitation films and drive-in double features, directors Quentin Tarantino and Robert Rodriguez serve up a chilling two-fer with "Death Proof" and "Planet Terror." The first is about a killer car; the second's a zombie flick. In the opener, Kurt Russell plays a stuntman wreaking havoc with his wheels of death. Then, survivors of a bio-weapon mishap battle an army of killer zombies. Rose McGowan has roles in both. Tarantino and Rodriguez also scripted their films(n)

programme.title: Face Off
programme.desc: Action thriller in which an FBI agent agrees to have the face of a captured international terrorist grafted onto his own head in order to discover the location of an enormous bomb. The plan goes awry when the terrorist, now having assumed the agent's face, escapes and destroys all evidence of the switch. A deadly cat-and-mouse game ensues(n)

programme.title: Me, Myself & Irene
programme.desc: A state trooper with multiple personality disorder tries to save a woman from thugs(n)

programme.title: The Meddler
programme.desc: After the death of her husband, a woman named Marnie relocates to L.A. to be closer to her daughter Lori, a Hollywood screenwriter. While Lori frets about her mum's smothering ways, Marnie keeps getting involved in the lives of others(n)

programme.title: For Love of the Game
programme.desc: A veteran pitcher played by , reflects on his life and career as he pitches his final game(n)

programme.title: Friday After Next
programme.desc: The gang from Friday and Next Friday are back in this urban comedy, in which Craig (Ice Cube) and Day-Day (Mike Epps) have finally moved out of their respective parents' homes and gotten an apartment together. However, a bogus neighborhood Santa Claus (Rickey Smiley) decides to help Craig and Day-Day share the wealth by robbing their apartment, and when he rips off their stereo, he also makes off with their rent money, which was hidden in the speaker cabinets. Desperate to make rent and have some money for Christmas presents, Craig and Day-Day land jobs at a local strip mall, where their fathers, Mr. Jones (John Witherspoon) and Uncle Elroy (Don "D.C." Curry), have gone into business together running a barbecue joint. Craig and Day-Day are installed as security guards, and while Craig tries to make time with Donna (K.D. Aubert), a saleswoman at the Pimp N' Ho's Boutique, and keep things orderly at Holy Moly's Doughnut Shop, Day-Day attempts to transform himself into a master of crime-fighting, which causes a lot more problems than it solves. Friday After Next is the first feature film from director Marcus Raboy, who previously directed music videos for Sting, Li'l Kim, Staind, and Friday After Next star Ice Cube(n)

When a heavily guarded work of art is stolen, the insurance investigator persuades her employers to let her go undercover and team up with a master thief. The thief sets the woman a rigorous training programme before they embark on a series of robberies against an emotional backdrop of distrust and growing a(n)

programme.title: Blood Father
programme.desc: An ex-con fights to protect his estranged teenage daughter after her boyfriend frames her for stealing money from a drug cartel(n)

programme.title: Blonde Ambition
programme.desc: Endearing romantic comedy about a small-town sweetheart (a delightfully charming Jessica Simpson) who heads to New York City to catch up with her boyfriend, who is cheating on her, and stays to take a job with a big company, where she finds love with a handsome employee (Luke Wilson) and becomes a pawn in a corporate power struggle. Country-music legend Willie Nelson costars as Simpson's grandfather. Directed by Scott Marshall (son of Garry Marshall)(n)

programme.title: Aquamarine
programme.desc: A mermaid agrees to grant a wish to two Florida teenagers if they help her romance a lifeguard(n)

programme.title: Uptown Girls
programme.desc: In this comedy from director Boaz Yakin (Remember the Titans), Brittany Murphy stars as Molly Gunn, the daughter of a dead rock star, who lives off her inheritance and has never worked a day in her life. When her father's estate is swindled away from her, Molly suddenly finds her life of luxury and excess pulled out from under her. Begrudgingly, she decides that she has to get a job and is hired as a nanny for Ray Schliene (Dakota Fanning), the daughter of record executive Roma Schliene (Heather Locklear). At first Molly can't shake her spoiled-brat personality, but eventually she and Ray discover that they have a lot in common and a strong bond is formed. Jesse Spencer plays Molly's boyfriend, and Donald Faison, who previously worked with Murphy in Clueless, plays another record executive who offers Molly a place to live until she gets on her feet(n)

programme.title: Freaks of Nature
programme.desc: A town full of humans, zombies, and vampires living in coexistence are thrust into an all-out war when aliens invade. Now, three teens (Nicholas Braun, Josh Fadem, and Mackenzie Davis) must defeat the newest visitors to restore the peace their town previously held. Robbie Pickering directs this horror comedy(n)

programme.title: Blood Father
programme.desc: An ex-con fights to protect his estranged teenage daughter after her boyfriend frames her for stealing money from a drug cartel(n)

programme.title: About a Boy
programme.desc: Adaptation of the Nick Hornby novel about the friendship that develops between a bright but awkward 12-year-old boy and a wayward thirtysomething man masquerading as a lone parent in a bid to seduce single mothers. The boy initiates the bachelor into the world of adult responsibility and meaningful relationships as the bond between them deepens(n)

programme.title: The Family Fang
programme.desc: Caleb and Camille Fang (Christopher Walken and Maryann Plunkett) are a couple famous for public, avant-garde comedy skits that featured their children, previously known as Child A and Child B. Now adults with successful showbiz careers of their own, Annie (Nicole Kidman) and Baxter Fang (Jason Bateman) are estranged from their parents and lament their exploitation as kids. When Caleb and Camille go missing, Annie and Baxter reunite at their childhood home to determine if their parents are truly in trouble, or if their disappearance is their final stunt. Bateman directed this off-kilter family drama, which received its world premiere at the 2015 Toronto International Film Festival(n)

programme.title: Stripes
programme.desc: Bill Murray and Harold Ramis star in this comedy as two friends who, bored with their jobs, decide to join the army(n)

programme.title: Commando
programme.desc: Action-adventure starring Arnold Schwarzenegger as a former special agent who is reluctantly pulled back into duty when his daughter is kidnapped by a gang of right-wing extremists(n)

programme.title: Jerry Maguire
programme.desc: Tom Cruise is the sports agent who makes the mistake of saying what he believes is the truth only to find himself sacked and abandoned by all his clients apart from small time footballer Cuba Gooding Jnr (a role that was to win him an Oscar) in Cameron Crowe's metaphor on America's need for success and money in equal quantities(n)

programme.desc: The Grim Reaper grants a tycoon a few extra days of life in this remake of 1934's "Death Takes a Holiday"(n)

programme.title: Bridge to Terabithia
programme.desc: Jess Aarons trained all summer to become the fastest runner in school, so he's very upset when newcomer Leslie Burke outruns him and everyone else. Despite this and other differences, including that she's rich, he's poor, and she's a city girl, he's a country boy, the two become fast friends. Together, they create Terabithia, a land of monsters, trolls, ogres, and giants and rule as king and queen. This friendship helps Jess cope with the tragedy that makes him realise what Leslie taught him(n)

programme.title: The Good Dinosaur
programme.desc: In this enchanting computer-animated fantasy, set in a world where the dinosaurs never went extinct, an amiable young Apatosaurus befriends a prehistoric human child as he embarks on a journey to reunite with his family(n)

programme.title: The Shallows
programme.desc: A young surfer is hunted by a great white shark at a secluded beach, and ends up stranded on an embankment away from the shoreline. Alone and wounded, she attempts to survive the attack and get ashore(n)

programme.desc: Screenwriter-director Tim Blake Nelson adapted his play for this graphic and disturbing drama about a group of prisoners in a Nazi death camp near the end of WWII who were coerced into exterminating their Jewish brethren. David Arquette, Steve Buscemi, Harvey Keitel, Allan Corduner, Mira Sorvino, Natasha Lyonne, Daniel Benzali, David Chandler(n)

programme.title: Pi
programme.desc: In this award-winning intellectual thriller, a math genius (Sean Gullette) develops a dangerous obsession with an elusive 216-number sequence. He is pursued by corporate agents who are also after the number, which is tied to the stock market. Mark Margolis, Ben Shenkman. Written and directed by Darren Aronofsky(n)

programme.title: Aileen: Life and Death of a Serial Killer
programme.desc: Nick Broomfield's second documentary on Aileen Carol Wuornos, a highway prostitute who was executed in 2002 for killing seven men in the state of Florida(n)

programme.title: Scenic Route
programme.desc: Two longtime friends (Josh Duhamel and Dan Fogler) whose bond has grown frail become locked in a bitter life-or-death struggle after their pickup truck breaks down in the desert in this drama from the directing duo of Michael and Kevin Goetz(n)

programme.title: Side Effects
programme.desc: Rooney Mara stars as Emily Taylor; her husband Martin (Channing Tatum) is a young businessman who, as the film opens, is soon to be released from prison after serving a few years for financial fraud. Overcome with stress, the mentally fragile Emily performs a quasi-suicide attempt and is put in the care of Dr. Jonathan Banks (Jude Law), a workaholic psychiatrist who convinces Emily to see him once a week for therapy. Jonathan is intrigued enough by Emily's story to seek counsel from her former therapist, Dr. Victoria Siebert (Catherine Zeta-Jones). One night Emily commits a horrific act that she claims not to remember because she was taking the medication prescribed to her by Jonathan, leading to a very public legal battle that leads to Jonathan taking a major public blow to his reputation. This turn of events prompts the chastened doctor to look deeper into Emily's past. Directed by Steven Soderbergh from a script by his regular collaborator Scott Z. Burns(n)

programme.title: The Filth and the Fury
programme.desc: Julien Temple directed this documentary chronicling the rise and fall of notorious punk-rock band the Sex Pistols. John Lydon, Paul Cook, Steve Jones, Glen Matlock, Malcolm McLaren, Nancy Spungen, Sid Vicious(n)

programme.title: No
programme.desc: Gael García Bernal stars as an ad exec who agrees to produce the TV ads for a campaign against Chile's dictator Augusto Pinochet(n)

programme.title: Fathers and Daughters
programme.desc: Jake is left to raise his daughter, Katie, on his own after his wife dies in a car accident and he suffers a mental breakdown. He struggles with daily routines and his relatives intend to take Katie away, but Jake knows that he has to hold on to the one thing that he loves the most - his daughter(n)

programme.title: Under the Same Moon
programme.desc: A galaxy of Spanish-language television stars do what they do best in this timely tearjerker about illegal immigration. A 9-year-old Mexican boy (Adrian Alonso) embarks on a dangerous border-crossing adventure in hopes of reuniting with his mother (Kate del Castillo), an undocumented immigrant working as a domestic in L.A. Carmen Salinas and America Ferrera ("Ugly Betty") costar(n)

programme.desc: Nothing can snap a cynical philosophy professor out of a mental funk, except for a young student whose presence offers a breath of fresh air in his otherwise unfulfilling existence(n)

programme.desc: Locals and tourists in Rome find their lives intersecting. An architect tries to recapture his youth; an ordinary guy unexpectedly becomes famous; a couple are torn apart by new love interests; an opera director tries to get a mortician to sing on stage(n)

programme.title: Maggie's Plan
programme.desc: Maggie, a young woman longing to start a family, becomes involved in a complicated love triangle with a struggling novelist and his haughty theorist wife(n)

programme.title: After Spring

programme.title: Irrational Man

programme.title: Wadjda
programme.desc: Writer/director Haifaa al-Mansour makes her feature directorial debut with this film about a headstrong 10-year-old girl named Wadjda (Waad Mohammed) who's determined to challenge a neighborhood boy to a bike race despite the potentially dire repercussions. When Wadjda's mother refuses to purchase her a bike, the young girl defiantly enters a Koran reading competition to earn the money she needs to buy it herself. Once Wadjda has her bike, the only thing left to do is prove to her young friend Abdullah that girls can race bikes just as well as boys. But not everyone is willing to accept a young girl who refuses to play by society's rules, and now the closer Wadjda gets to achieving her goal, the deeper her understanding of the division between the sexes grows(n)

programme.title: Maggie's Plan

programme.title: Fathers and Daughters
programme.desc: Jake is left to raise his daughter, Katie, on his own after his wife dies in a car accident and he suffers a mental breakdown. programme.title: Alpha and Omega
programme.desc: Kate and Humphrey are two mismatched wolves who embark on a cross-country quest to get back home and restore peace in their pack after being relocated thousands of miles away by well-meaning park rangers. Humphrey likes to frolic with friends and play video games with squirrels while disciplined Kate likes to call the shots and hunt caribou. Normally, an omega wolf like Humphrey would never stand a chance with an alpha wolf like Kate, but now they must work together to get back to their natural habitat. Even though a growing mutual appreciation of their talents and then a deeper love threatens to disastrously complicate everything if they make it home..(n)

programme.title: Fired Up!
programme.desc: To get out of having to attend a sweltering hot football camp, two high-school athletes opt to try their luck at cheerleading camp instead(n)

programme.title: Lucky 7
programme.desc: On her deathbed, Rachel Myer (Gail O'Grady) rallies long enough to provide her seven-year-old daughter Amy with a foolproof "timeline" to achieve great success in life. Growing up to become a prominent Seattle lawyer, Amy (played as an adult by Kimberly Williams-Paisley) has never gone wrong following her late mother's advice. Crucial to the timeline is her quest for the perfect husband. As pre-determined by her mom, the lucky man will have to be Amy's seventh boyfriend. Unfortunately, Amy has fallen deeply in love with Boyfriend Number Six, a good-looking, if somewhat pompous, young blade named Daniel (Brad Rowe). So as not to upset the continuum, Amy must shop around for an "alternate" number six, enabling Daniel to emerge as number seven. The man ultimately chosen for the express purpose of being dumped by Amy is Peter Connor (Patrick Dempsey), a former Wall Street broker now running a small bagel store. Anyone who has ever seen one of those Ginger Rogers or Rosalind Russell romantic comedies of the 1940s should have little difficulty predicting the outcome of this story. The made-for-cable Lucky Seven premiered July 20, 2003, on the ABC Family Channel(n)

programme.title: Kung Fu Hustle
programme.desc: Director Stephen Chow made his name in this country with the deliriously wonderful Shaolin Soccer and Kung Fu Hustle continues his love of comedy kung-fu films. Set in pre-revolutionary China, Chow plays Sing, a street hustler who makes the mistake of pretending to be a member of the notorious Axe gang. He becomes caught up in a war between the gang and the residents of Pig Sty Alley, which the gang want to take over. Little do they know that two of the Alley's residents are retired martial arts experts and soon the fists and feet are flying in knockabout fights that owe as much to Kill Bill (some of the wire work is done by Yuen Wo Ping, who worked on Tarantino's film) as they do to classic Hollywood silent comedies. Film fans can enjoy Chow's references to films ranging from Top Hat to The Shining while the rest can just enjoy a wildly entertaining romp. In Cantonese with English subtitles(n)

programme.title: Blood Out
programme.desc: A small town sheriff retires his badge to avenge his brother's murder, but finds himself tempted into the criminal lifestyle by a beautiful killer in this gritty crime thriller. Dejected when veteran detectives write off his brother's murder as gang related, Sheriff Michael Spencer (Luke Goss) decides to take the law into his own hands. Posing as a violent, tattooed gangster, he quickly works his way up through the criminal ranks. In the process, Michael begins to lose his own identity, eventually becoming romantically entangled with a ruthless temptress (AnnaLynne McCord), and ultimately facing off against the leader of a powerful criminal empire (Val Kilmer). Vinnie Jones and Curtis "50 Cent" Jackson co-star(n)

Also starring Anthony Hopkins, Emily Blunt and Hugo Weaving. Alongside Dave Elsey, Rick Baker won his seventh Best Makeup Oscar for The Wolfman; a run of success that started in 1982 with An American Werewolf in London(n)

programme.title: The Chronicles of Narnia: Prince Caspian
programme.desc: The adventure continues as producer/director Andrew Adamson teams with screenwriters Christopher Markus and Stephen McFeely to tell the tale of the dashing Prince Caspian (Ben Barnes) -- who sets out to defeat a tyrannical king who has overtaken Narnia and secure his rightful place on the throne. One year has passed since the events of The Chronicles of Narnia: The Lion, the Witch, and the Wardrobe, and now the kings and queens of that land have returned to make a shocking discovery. Though by their calendars it has been only 12 months since their last voyage into Narnia, the four children are aghast to realize that 1,300 years have passed in the wondrous alternate universe. The Golden Age of Narnia has come to an end, and now the malevolent King Miraz rules over the land without mercy or compassion. Miraz is determined to ensure that the power stays in his bloodline, even if that means killing his nephew Prince Caspian so that Miraz's own son will be next in line for the throne. Fortunately Prince Caspian has the Narnians on his side, and with a little help from the kings, the queens, and some loyal old friends, he may be able to ensure that peace and prosperity are restored on the once-beautiful realm of Narnia(n)

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: A Paige From the Past. Guided by Whitelighter Leo (Brian Krause), Paige (Rose McGowan) journeys back to her high school days, hoping to confront and overcome her guilt over the accident that killed her adoptive parents. In the process, Paige recalls her first awareness of her special powers. Meanwhile, back in the present, Piper (Holly Marie Combs) must stop the marriage between Phoebe (Alyssa Milano) and Cole (Julian McMahon) -- or rather, the marriage between the evil spirits presently possessing Phoebe's and Cole's bodies!(n)

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Trial by Magic. Phoebe does her jury service on a murder case and realises that the defendant is not guilty when she has a premonition about the real killer. programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: The Benders. Sam is abducted and finds himself the quarry of a demented human-hunting family, while Dean searches for him with a female police officer whose brother may have been a similar victim years ago(n)

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Shadow. Thrilling new paranormal series. Two brothers travel through America hunting demons. Sam is reunited with an old friend, but he soon discovers that she is using the brothers to entice their father (Series 1)(n)

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: The But in the Joke. The murder of a stand-up comedian results in Booth taking to the stage to find the killer. Also, Angela uncovers the identity of a Banksy-style artist(n)

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: The Ghost in the Machine. Fan favourite Avalon Harmonia, played by Cyndi Lauper, is called in to contact the spirit of a deceased teenager with unfinished business(n)

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: The Diamond in the Rough. When a professional ballroom dancer is killed before her audition for a reality-TV dance competition, Brennan and Booth pose as potential contestants to hunt for suspects(n)

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: The Archaeologist in the Cocoon. An archaeologist with a dubious reputation is murdered soon after making an important discovery(n)

programme.title: Percy Jackson & the Olympians: The Lightning Thief

Veteran director Chris Columbus (Home Alone, Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone) directs from his own script with co-writer Craig Titley. 3:10 to Yuma's Logan Lerman toplines a godlike cast that includes Uma Thurman, Pierce Brosnan, and Sean Bean(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Star Crossed. Briscoe and Green investigate the murder of a luxury sports car dealer and soon identify a link between the victim's last customer and a recent spate of robberies. However, the discovery that their prime suspect has learning difficulties soon leads the team to his manipulative girlfriend(n)

programme.desc: B-tch. Briscoe and Green investigate the murder of a successful stockbroker, who was conducting affairs with a mother and her daughter. After being interviewed, it seems that both women have a motive for the murder(n)

Meanwhile, Phoebe's personality radically changes after Cole gives her an engagement ring that belonged to the Charmed Ones' grandmother(n)

programme.desc: The Corpse on the Canopy. Hodgins fears that Christopher Pelant is back for revenge after he and Angela are drugged, and a corpse is found in their bed canopy while flower petals are spread around their son's crib. In the ensuing investigation, the team discover the body belongs to a Special Forces agent linked to a soldier-for-hire organization, but Hodgins and Angela ignore Booth's request to let the FBI handle the case and start a probe of their own(n)

programme.desc: The Twist in the Plot. Daisy's first case since breaking up with Sweets is a doozy: the remains of two bodies, one a female cancer patient, the other her life coach, found at the same burial site. Meanwhile, Brennan and Booth discuss their preferences for funeral arrangements after they die(n)

programme.title: Castle

programme.title: Castle
programme.desc: The Blame Game. Castle gets abducted and must solve puzzles and mind games with a group of strangers. Meanwhile, Beckett and her colleagues race against the clock to find Castle and capture a killer(n)

programme.title: Castle
programme.desc: And Justice for All. A student learning to speak English is killed and his classmates keep mum when questioned by police, so Castle goes undercover to gain info on the victim by enrolling in the class as a French Canadian immigrant(n)

programme.title: Thor
programme.desc: Exiled to Earth after his arrogance fans the flames of an ancient conflict, the mighty Thor (Chris Hemsworth) of Asgard battles a destructive force sent to crush humanity in this exhilarating comic-book adventure. Only when the banished prince has defeated an opponent capable of crushing him in battle will he learn what it takes to be a true leader(n)

programme.title: Walking Tall
programme.desc: When a former member of the U.S. Army Special Forces returns to his small hometown in rural Washington State hoping to realise a childhood dream of working in the local lumber mill, he discovers that much has changed. The normally tranquil town is now besieged by drugs, outbreaks of violence and a general feeling of malaise and terror, with many pointing a finger at the influence of a crooked casino where his ex-girlfriend now works as a dancer(n)

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.desc: Ho'Oma'ike (Unmasked). While the team pursue a copycat killer inspired by a slasher film, Jerry gets on the wrong side of the counterfeiters he's been tracking(n)
